editorialNotes.standard: If youâve ever dreamed of ruling your own fantasy world populated with scaly serpents and other mythical beasties, Dragon City is a treasure trove. Itâs delightfully satisfying to breed, hatch, and raise dragons with an array of elemental abilities, and then enter them in PokÃ©mon-style battles against friends or exciting league tournaments. If youâre a more peaceful dragon-lord in search of relaxation, simply clear land, build habitats, and develop enough farms to feed your ever-growing population of wily wyverns.

ios.subtitle: The boss arrived in the office

editorialNotes.standard: A phenomenon from the start, PokÃ©mon GO hasnât stopped evolving. Since launch, the best-in-class location-based AR game has expanded with countless improvements. Hatch eggs while the game runs in the background. Battle other trainers with your favorite creatures. Join memorable community day events. With a steady stream of awesome updates and hundreds of iconic creatures to catch, Nianticâs groundbreaking hit just keeps getting better.
Smash monsters, wield awesome weapons, and explore an unforgettable megacity in this cyberpunk adventure from the makers of Genshin Impact and Honkai: Star Rail.

Elemental magic rules the land of Teyvat in the remarkable Genshin Impactâand as a powerful Traveler, you put this power to good use. Vibrant visual effects transform elemental blasts of fire, ice, and lightning into jaw-dropping spectacles. But itâs not just a looker: Genshin Impactâs beautiful open world is filled with thrilling quests and fascinating secrets. Climb mountains, cook meals, and soar through the skies as you search for your lost siblingâor simply get lost in Teyvat and see what happens.
editorialNotes.short: Explore a new land, and meet amazing new characters.

ios.subtitle: Find the Baby Prank With Daddy

editorialNotes.standard: Recruit both mercs and monsters while the titans pick on bullies their own size in this hefty battler.

A comic book fanâs dream, Marvel Strike Force lets you build the ultimate team of heroes and villains, then face enemy crews in breathtaking strategic battles. Can the Sinister Six withstand Human Torchâs supernova? Will Star-Lordâs dancing distract the X-Men long enough for Ultron to finish them off? Whether youâre braving deep story missions or buddying up in riveting Alliance Wars, youâll love playing with Marvelâs mightiest. Excelsior!
Loot lovers, rejoice! Swing swords and cast spells to extract treasure in this challenging RPGâs dangerous dungeons.

editorialNotes.standard: The fragility and fear of growing up. The terror of leaping into the unknown. Life is Strange tackles tough issues in a remarkable way, merging the superpowered and surreal with characters that feel authentic. Youâre drawn into the adventure through gorgeous visuals. Sharp writing, excellent voice acting, and a compelling story make solving Life is Strangeâs mysteries feel essential.

editorialNotes.standard: Here comes the wave! In this gorgeous open-world RPG, explore eroded landscapes, battle otherworldly creatures, and unlock incredible skills.

From the mind of gaming visionary Jenova Chen, Sky: Children of the Light is full of enchanting delights. Soar over rolling hills, through voluminous cloud formations, and across stunning vistas as you explore a remarkable fantasy world. Every puzzle unlocks unexpected paths; clever social features make flying together as easy as holding hands. So go on. Take a leap.

editorialNotes.standard: Ever wondered what lifeâs really like in the Fallout gamesâ underground vaults? Experience all the challenges of running a post-apocalyptic communityâfrom building gardens and power plants to playing matchmaker for your citizens. Eavesdropping on their goofy conversations never gets old, and an adorable art style Ã  la Falloutâs Pip-Boy cartoons will make series fans swoon. Itâs not all lighthearted hijinks, though: Whether at home or exploring the Wasteland, your people will face raiders and other dangers.
